dataFormat.description: The data format to use for the configuration files.

guiEditorOnRightSide.description: If enabled, the GUI editor will be on the right side and the code editor on the left. Otherwise, it will be the opposite way.

guiEditor.description: GUI Editor related settings belong here.

elementNavigationWithSeparateButton.description: If true, every array or object element will have a navigation button displayed next to its name, that allows navigating into that object/array. If false, instead of a separate button the object/array property key itself will become clickable for navigation inside.

debuggingActive.description: If enabled, the internal application state is shown.
